title: Ocean Lost
description: Walter crawled up on a foreign shore after escaping his parent's murderer. Walter learned a new language, straightened up and found a new family. Now at sixteen Walter's fallen for an impossible love. Sienna swims competitively and Walter's allergic to pool water. With too many secrets and life threatening dangers, how can this relationship ever work? Especially since Sienna's human and Walter is not.
author: Sarah Wagstaff
